trans-unit.source: Represents the response to operations sent to the data service as a result of calling <xref href="System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.SaveChanges"></xref>.
The headers from an HTTP response associated with a batch request.

The headers property on the <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceResponse> instance returned will be an empty collection when batching is not used because there is no set of headers that represents the entire save operation.
An <xref href="System.Collections.IDictionary"></xref> object containing the name-value pairs of an HTTP response.
The status code from an HTTP response associated with a batch request.
For batching operations, this is the status code from the HTTP response associated with the entire batch.
For non-batching requests, the value is always 200, which means the caller must inspect each operation to determine its result.
An integer based on status codes defined in [Hypertext Transfer Protocol](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=119520).

Gets an enumerator that enables retrieval of responses to operations being tracked by <xref href="System.Data.Services.Client.OperationResponse"></xref> objects within the <xref href="System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceResponse"></xref>.
An enumerator over the response received from the service.
Gets a Boolean value that indicates whether the response contains multiple results.
A Boolean value that indicates whether the response contains multiple results.

Gets an enumerator that enables retrieval of responses to operations being tracked by <xref href="System.Data.Services.Client.OperationResponse"></xref> objects within the <xref href="System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceResponse"></xref>.
An enumerator over the response received from the service.
